Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg'}
{3: '3:00 PM, Refugee Camp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: "What's your name again?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: "Wait, you're Elene, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: "I'm Elene. You got it wrong again.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sitting nearby, Lamia says.'}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: 'Elene... Merlin... Ruolin...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The old man mumbles, becoming less audible as he goes on.'}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: "Time... is gone... I can't find it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the human feeds the last bit of medicine to the old man, he gradually falls asleep. Lamia tucks him in again.'}
{3: 'The human tries to clean up the empty bowls.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: 'Here, let me do it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "I don't want people to think I'm dumping all the work on you and all.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lamia can't see the human's face through the bandages, but she offers to help anyway, having sensed that the human was about to say something."}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "See, I'm super grateful that you helped me turn him over, but I'm sure they're going to make this a one-person job going forward if I let you do everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "And if that happens, we'll end up with twice the workload, so I say we just take it easy here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Through the slits, Lamia can see that the human seems momentarily dazed. A second later, the Gray Raven Commandant nods.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{3: 'Lamia picks up on the subtle changes the moment she steps out of the temporary camp with the empty bowls.'}
{3: 'The two guards patrolling near the warehouse start chatting, yet their gazes toward this way remain blatant.'}
{3: 'The guard standing on the watchtower looks like he is overseeing the entire camp, and yet he seems to be paying special attention this way.'}
{3: 'A refugee sorting through his trash is passing something from his left hand to his right hand—without ever putting it where it should go.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, the human standing next to Lamia quietly observes all these people as they adjust the bandages on their face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Is the commandant plotting an escape route or something?)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Lamia slows down to give the human some more time to observe.'}
{3: "She still doesn't know what brought the Gray Raven Commandant here."}
{3: "But always trying to minimize her presence, Lamia sure is glad to have someone here who gets showered with everyone's attention."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(I can kiss this place goodbye as soon as the transport vehicle gets here.)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Which means the Gray Raven Commandant will have all the time in the world to deal with these people.)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'After returning their items, Lamia and her companion are assigned different tasks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Should have taken my time with it...)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Lamia lets out an internal sigh. Had she been on her own, she would have taken all the time there was in the world in the tent.'}
{3: 'But the Gray Raven Commandant seems to have a different plan, wasting no time finishing all the given tasks before rushing off to wherever the commandant is supposed to go next.'}

{3: "It just so happens to be Lamia's turn to partner with the Gray Raven Commandant today, giving her a perfect opportunity to strike up a conversation to see exactly what the commandant is doing here."}
{3: 'And yet she passes up the chance again, promising herself that she would definitely do it next time.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Don't they feel guilty at all for employing child labor?)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Oh, right, it probably doesn't count as employment if they don't pay us.)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sun is gone by the time Lamia has finished her assigned work, with a brilliant starry cloak hanging over the night sky.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{3: 'Artificial lights are no longer able to brighten the night sky, so the lights from thousands of years ago unfold.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: 'I wonder if Babylonia is somewhere up there.', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Lamia lies on the rock she usually slacks off on, with no intention of returning to her bed just yet.'}
{3: 'Right then, she hears a raspy voice coming from behind.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: 'Eek! Even a cat walks louder than you!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Almost jumping to her feet, Lamia gives the human a piece of her mind.'}
{3: 'Given her current guise of a "brave little girl who has lost her legs" and her plan of taking her time with everything, jumping to her feet now would spoil everything.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(But well, did I let my guard down back there.)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'You sounded sure just now. Have you been to Babylonia yourself?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lamia was about to roll her eyes at the human's firm denial."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(That was one swift no. Not feeling guilty about lying to a kid, I see.)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(But then again, who am I to say anything when it comes to lying?)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "How would you know Babylonia is not somewhere in there if you've never been to Babylonia yourself?", 4: '1'}
{3: "The human before her falls quiet at the question. Through the bandages, Lamia can't see their facial expression."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Guess the commandant is not good at lying to kids?)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "So? You're not going to say you've actually been there, are you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a hint of vengeance, Lamia presses on with her question.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I've heard that Babylonia is just a spaceship.", 3: '102'}
{2: "One that's not big enough to leave a mark in the sky like a star.", 3: '103'}
{3: "At the ambiguous response, Lamia does not pursue further. It isn't the Gray Raven Commandant that she's after anyway."}
{2: "You're different from everyone at the camp.", 3: '105'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "That's probably because I'm just an outsider like you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'May I sit here?', 3: '107'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Why are you asking me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because you seem to like this place.', 3: '109'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "I don't own this place, so suit yourself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing the human sit a distance away from her, Lamia gives up the idea of moving to the side for the time being.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "But you're pretty different yourself, wouldn't you say?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Why are you sitting on the ground when you can sit on the rock?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Because you seem like you'd rather keep a distance from people.", 3: '114'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "Oh... didn't know I came off as a loner to you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Crap, did I go too far with this role-playing thing?)', 4: '18'}
{2: "It's not uncommon, though.", 3: '118'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "You sound like you're a people person.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "You must've been quite popular before they did a number on your face? What's the word for that? Social...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Social butterfly?', 3: '122'}
{2: 'There are people who hate my guts, though.', 3: '124'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Yup, pretty sure there are, so could you please take the hint and just go away now?)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Lamia secretly complains to herself as she continues the topic.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "It's impossible for everyone to like you... Getting hated on by everyone, though, seems more likely.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia curls up her prosthetic legs, speaking with a hint of dejection.'}
{2: "I don't think those people living in the camp dislike you, do they?", 3: '131'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "Pretty sure you're the type that says whatever is on their mind...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Feeling the human's gaze, Lamia turns her head away, feeling awkward."}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'People never take me seriously, and I only learn about what they think of me from what they say behind my back.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "The warehouse manager says I can't lift things to save my life, the food distributor thinks I eat too much, and the overseer finds me barely useful...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'People never bother talking to Lamia who deliberately keeps her distance from people, and she quite enjoys being unnoticed.'}
{3: "It's only when she faces this human—who's masked like herself—that she feels comfortable enough to pour her heart out."}
{3: 'She opens up like a floodgate, recounting her recent experiences and feelings as "Elene".'}
{3: 'With the human listening to her quietly, Lamia feels heard.'}
{3: 'The human keeps their eyes on Lamia without saying a word—which, to her, is more than she could have hoped for.'}
{3: 'Gradually, however, Lamia grows quiet when it hits her that...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Damn it, I spoke a little too much... Gotta change the subject now.)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "You're awfully quiet there... Want to talk about yourself?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you sure?', 3: '146'}
{3: 'Lamia nods.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Yes, just like this. Go ahead and tell me everything there is to know about Babylonia already... Well, guess that's not gonna happen.)", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(But that totally got the commandant distracted.)', 4: '18'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Let me start with a question, then.', 3: '153'}
{2: "Care to explain why you've been watching me this past few days?", 3: '154'}
